
Changelog
=========

0.3.0 (2015-11-28)
------------------

* Fix issues with Python 2.7.

0.2.0 (2015-11-19)
------------------

* Remove some workarounds. Requires ``cookiecutter>=1.3.0``.

0.1.1 (2015-11-05)
------------------

* Force `utf8` in various places.

0.1.0 (2015-10-19)
------------------

* First release on PyPI.
